Choke

Ordering

Only 2 steps necessary:

  1. Send us a direct message or an email with a description of your order. This description should include:
    • Mailing Address
    • Selection of Digital, Analog, or Chimera
    • CashApp handle or PayPal username
    • A list containing five genres from our catalog
  2. Finalize your order through CashApp or PayPal.
    • Money transfers can be made to chokefoundation with the platform specified in the order description.

The instant both steps have been completed, we will consider your order active and begin the assembly and shipping process immediately .
